column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////There was a wait of about one hour on a Friday night even to place a carryout order (!)
column2: so we walked down Wells to The Pepper Canister for some friendly pints and Irish whiskey. I took my order
column3: a personal pan Chicago Classic for $8.95--easily enough for two meals--back to the hotel. It was none the worse for wear
column4: and in fact the second half was excellent the next day.
